Welcome to my personal website, a spot to collect together my research and interests.

If you have no time, click here to download my latest [CV](drago_cv_2021.pdf).

Otherwise, feel free to check out [My Projects](projects.html) to see what I am working on, or visit my [Publications](publications.html) to see my papers and presentations.

The fastest way to get in touch with me is via email at daria.rago [at] med.lu.se
